title: So It's You
overview: Jin Fu Zhu is a rising judoka. Despite her tough appearance, she has the heart of a young girl. She meets swimming prodigy Li Jun Chen, who appears cold in order to hide away his pain. Although their meeting started out as a misunderstanding, they slowly fall in love. Under Jin Fu Zhu's encouragement, Li Jun Chen overcomes his trauma, and his relationship with his parents also improves.Â
